Threat of Silence is a first-person horror about a woman with schizophrenia. It's based on my own experience with the sickness. Everything you're about to play is a true story. Even the journals are clipped from journal entries I actually wrote. 

With that in mind, the game is in early development, so be patient. With the game's Kickstarter we hope to improve the game even more than it is now.

Here is a full commentary video on the game:

***A few problems****

If the framerate lowers during gameplay, especially if you are streaming, try the different versions of the game below. The slowness is due to your computer's resolution.

Also, lighting does not build for certain scenes. It's random every time. We don't know what's causing this.  Yes, we googled it.  If you think you know the solution, contact us.

If you liked what you played, or even think it can be BETTER, follow our pre launch Kickstarter page!
